version_description:
* Apple Music - Sync your Apple Music account and receive a FREE GIFT!
* NEW Special Offers on Fuel, Credits, Cash, XP, and Gems
* MORE EVENTS!
* NEW Shiny explosions and stuff
* RESTORE PURCHASE button has been added the the OPTIONS menu
* Gus has worked very hard on something, I don't know what because I don't speak dog. But he looks exhausted and seems very pleased with himself.

* Gus has worked very hard on something, I don't know what because I don't speak dog. But he looks exhausted and seems very pleased with himself.

* NEW Special Offers on Fuel, Credits, Cash, XP, and Gems
* MORE EVENTS!

* Huge new event coming soon - featuring over 20 Internet celebrities!
* New epic Car Boosts available!
* Performance is now as smooth as your dad’s head.
* Gus the pug is packing his bags ready to travel the world. Hope his flight isn’t overbooked!

* Huge new event coming soon - featuring over 20 Internet celebrities!
* New epic Car Boosts available!
* Performance is now as smooth as your dad’s head.
* Gus the pug is packing his bags ready to travel the world. Hope his flight isn’t overbooked!

* Huge new event coming soon - featuring over 20 Internet celebrities!
* New epic Car Boosts available!
* Performance is now as smooth as your dad’s head.
* Gus the pug is packing his bags ready to travel the world. Hope his flight isn’t overbooked!

* Get your hands on the Buzzsaw drone - but watch out it cuts!
* Now it’s even easier to get drones from weekend events
* Drive at high speed listening to Harry Shotta's brand new single!
* Gus has gone to E3, eagerly awaiting the new XBone

* Now it’s even easier to get drones from weekend events
* Drive at high speed listening to Harry Shotta's brand new single!
* Gus has gone to E3, eagerly awaiting the new XBone

* Need a powerful drone fast? Now you can upgrade the Buzzsaw Drone straight to level 3!
* New weekend events coming soon: Avoid Milky Explosions and Stop the Aircat Industries Hack!
* Gus is going for the world fidget spinner record - he’s going to try and eat 137 in 5 minutes.

• Dead Prez’s huge track, "Hip-hop" added to game radio. Listen for FREE now!
• ’Super Loot’ is back and better than ever! ’Super Loot' now gives you Super XP and Super Cash Trucks per race.
• You can now earn FREE spray cans from events to customize your cars!
• Gus the pug has been sweating like a dog this summer. Fortunately winter is coming.

- Sun’s Out. Guns Out! The Fastlane Summer Sale starts now!
- You can now use your Gems to buy XP Trucks!
- New mid week event starting 8th August. Now you can earn Gold Tickets all week!
- Gus the Pug is hyped about the new Volcano Bay water park. He’s going to visit and add his own water feature.

* Join our new VIP Programme! Help improve the game and get FREE rewards!

* Gus the pug has been unlucky in love recently. Please send in your pug dating tips.

* Midweek Events now reward really juicy amounts of XP!
* Join our Most Valuable Driver programme to give feedback and get rewards!
* Gus the Pug has been inspired by this summer’s music festivals and wants to make his own tunes. Can you help?

This release is packed with events full of FREE Paint Sprays and Golden Tickets!

Can you take back the stash of photography gear that Chief Pat took?

A robot Jelly clone is driving around town causing people to go bald!

Selene has been stealing snakes from the zoo and squeezing out their venom to sell!

A robot Jelly clone is driving around town causing people to go bald!

Selene has been stealing snakes from the zoo and squeezing out their venom to sell!

Check out the latest Fastlane release for chances to get your hands on FREE Paint Sprays and Golden Tickets!

Slogoman has a plan to flood the city with an army of slugs, can you put a stop to this creepy crawler?

Summer is pretty much over, so why are there so many Ice Cream trucks on the road? Something fishy is going on, and I bet Wesley is involved.

Lin’s goons are knocking over Jewellery stores in the city, but they only took the watches. If you have the time, maybe you could help?

Check out the latest Fastlane release for chances to get your hands on FREE Paint Sprays and Golden Tickets!

Gus is getting in the spirit of Halloween but will he Trick or will he Treat? Find out in new events running over the spooky holiday period:
- 3 new Halloween events with spooky pickups
- New mid-week events to unlock Gems and XP
- What 3 Halloween outfits will Gus wear this year?

Halloween is almost upon us and it’s about to get spooky in the Fastlane:
- 3 Halloween events with themed pickups
- Get a scary amount of gems with our Halloween sale!
- Does Gus Trick or does he Treat?

Halloween may be over, but the villains of this city are still causing mischief.
Counterfeit baseball card scams, stolen watches, and Dani’s Eggcellent Adventure are only a taste of what the gangs have in store for November.
A new event starts every Monday and Thursday, so grab some boosts, recharge your fuel, and hit the Fastlane.

It is that magical time of year again; Black Friday! A day that celebrates a worldwide love of bargains, and discounts. Keep an eye on the store to see what offers the crew have for you!

It is also the season to be jolly. Since Gus is the jolliest little pup in town, we have asked him to help us deck the halls, and send you on some festive missions.

Gus is getting in the spirit of the holidays and has some great treats in store for our players:
- 20 new players levels from 200-220!
- 2 new cars to unlock and upgrade!
- New enemy types to destroy
- 6 new events to take you through into the new year

We are also now supporting the iPhone X!

We are also now supporting the iPhone X!

Happy new years everyone! After all that festive fun, the crew are eager to jump back in the drivers seat, and put the pedal to the metal.
- Removed the Christmas theme from the game icon and loading screens.
- Improved the refuelling process.
- Lots of fun events!

- Lots of fun events!

For Gus our beloved Pug, it has been a long journey. He has been to many places, seen many things, and crashed into far too many rockets.
In this bumper update he is bringing you experiences from around the world with a huge series of events, stay tuned to play them all!
We’ve also spent some time at the gas pumps and made it easier than ever to refuel your car.
Now go take back the city!

Gus is getting in the spirit of Halloween. Find out in new events running over the spooky holiday period:
* 3 exciting vehicle skins to unlock
* 3 Halloween events with spooky pickups
* Exciting offers, keep an eye on the store!

Also, continue travelling to exotic destinations:

+ LONDON: Race on the rainy streets and compete for 9 NEW London themed vehicle skins!
+ RUSSIA: Can you survive in the snowy countryside of RUSSIA? 9 NEW Russia themed vehicle skins to win!

VACATIONS! Our biggest update ever!
+ Travel to new cities around the world: Tokyo, Dubai, London, Rio and more!
+ Race it out against other drivers around the world to set the best score
+ Compete for huge prizes before your flight home
+ Loads of new vehicle skins to unlock, but only for the best drivers

Also:
+ Quality of life improvements
+ Chased bugs out of the city
+ Gave Gus a bath

Also:

+ Gave Gus a bath

Gus has already been busy picking his outfit for carnival.
And fixed bugs with the seatbelt sign on the car dash.

It’s Gus’ 1st birthday and he’s celebrating it in style! All his friends across the city have sent him presents, unfortunately people are trying to steal them!

In this update we need your help getting Gus get his birthday presents back, there’ll be something in it for you too!

In this update:
+ A new birthday event celebrating 1 year of Fastlane: Road To Revenge!
+ A very special limited time offer!

Thanks for a great first year, from all of the Fastlane team!

It’s Gus’ 1st birthday and he’s celebrating it in style! All his friends across the city have sent him presents, unfortunately people are trying to steal them!

In this update:
+ A new birthday event celebrating 1 year of Fastlane: Road To Revenge!
+ A very special limited time offer!

Thanks for a great first year, from all of the Fastlane team!

Whilst Gus was celebrating his birthday his team have been hard at work bringing the next feature to the streets.

Introducing… Race Boosts!
These boosts will give you the edge over your rivals and get you to your next league and car faster.

NITRO START: Nitro boost for the first 10 seconds of the race!
XP++: DOUBLE the value of EVERY XP pick up for the entire race!
MEGA BOOST: Significantly boost the duration of pickups for the entire race!

Gus has also chased more bugs out of the city.

In recent weeks Gus has been busy chasing bugs out of the city, now Fastlane should look even better on your new phone. Nice!
There’s also a new guy in town but he’s pretty shy, he’ll help you gather up even more Gems on the streets. Will you be visited by the Piggy Bank?
Keep an eye out for new events and exclusive deals coming your way!

VEHICLE BODIES: Ever wanted to drive an ice cream truck loaded with weapons? Soon you can! The auto shop is now open for business. Vehicle bodies can be applied to any existing vehicle! Unlock them in upcoming events and jobs!

RIVAL VEHICLES: Now when you destroy your rivals you will see the vehicle skin/body before they explode into bits. Show them who is the boss!

NEWSFEED: You’ll now be able to keep up with the latest news, awards, events and freebies in Fastlane with our Newsfeed!

VEHICLE BODIES: Ever wanted to drive an ice cream truck loaded with weapons? Soon you can! The auto shop is now open for business. Vehicle bodies can be applied to any existing vehicle! Unlock them in upcoming events and jobs!

RIVAL VEHICLES: Now when you destroy your rivals you will see the vehicle skin/body before they explode into bits. Show them who is the boss!

NEWSFEED: You’ll now be able to keep up with the latest news, awards, events and freebies in Fastlane with our Newsfeed!

VEHICLE BODIES: Ever wanted to drive an ice cream truck loaded with weapons? Soon you can! The auto shop is now open for business. Vehicle bodies can be applied to any existing vehicle! Unlock them in upcoming events and jobs!

Happy 2019 to everyone in the Fastlane! Another new year of exciting features ahead, for now:
+ New year, new you! And perhaps a new phone too? Sync your account to Game Center to move your progress to another device!
+ Exciting new skins in upcoming events!
+ New app icon
+ Chased some more bugs out of the city, “see ya”!

VACATIONS! Our biggest update ever!

+ Travel to new cities around the world: Tokyo, Dubai, London, Rio and more!
+ Race it out against other drivers around the world to set the best score
+ Compete for huge prizes before your flight home
+ Loads of new vehicle skins to unlock, but only for the best drivers

Also:
+ Quality of life improvements
+ Chased bugs out of the city
+ Gave Gus a bath

Get ready for another VACATION! 2 new LOCATIONS to visit!

+ LONDON: Race on the rainy streets and compete for 9 NEW London themed vehicle skins!
+ RUSSIA: Can you survive in the snowy countryside of RUSSIA? 9 NEW Russia themed vehicle skins to win!
+ Some minor bug fixes
+ We got Gus his own passport

Long time no see! Travis has been very busy lately, he has taken the whole car fleet to his workshop for an in-depth check-up to make sure they run smoothly for a long time!

The updates introduced will stop supporting the game running in some older models of iPhone, the game will need a 64-bit device running the latest iOS update.
